definition.text: Drop by to say hi, get help, and meet the Community! You may join the new Discord Server or the original Telegram groups below, where it all started!

translations.text: Mettiamo il massimo impegno nell'aiutare gli utenti a migliorare e ridefinire il concetto di cosa sia possibile fare con Superalgos! Unisciti alla conversazione...
Pasa para saludar, obtener ayuda y conocer a la Community! Puedes unirte al nuevo Discord Server o los grupos originales de Telegram a continuación, ¡donde comenzó todo!

paragraphs.text: • Community Group — Let's talk Superalgos!
• Support Group — Have an issue and need help?

translations.text: Support Group — ¿Tienes algún problema y necesitas ayuda?

paragraphs.text: • Develop Group — Meet other developers!
Join the Announcements Channel to be the first to know about new releases, hot fixes, and important issues!

translations.text: Unisciti agli Announcements Channel per essere sempre al corrente di nuove release, hot fix e aggiornamenti importanti!

paragraphs.text: • Grupo en Español — Hablemos en español!
• Группа на русском — Давайте говорить по русски
